mapper.insert: insert into basic_schoolyearterm (pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolterm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekdays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courselen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{morningsessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{afternoonsessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eveningsessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workstartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{learnstartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{learnenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update basic_schoolyearterm set schoolid = #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolterm = #{schoolterm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weekdays = #{weekdays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, courselen = #{courselen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, morningsessions = #{morningsessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, afternoonsessions = #{afternoonsessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eveningsessions = #{eveningsessions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, workstartdate = #{workstartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, workenddate = #{workenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, learnstartdate = #{learnstartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, learnenddate = #{learnenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime from basic_schoolyearterm where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime from basic_schoolyearterm

select pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime from basic_schoolyearterm WHERE schoolid=#{0}

select pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime from basic_schoolyearterm WHERE schoolid=#{0} and name=#{1}

select pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime from basic_schoolyearterm WHERE schoolid=#{0} and name=#{1} and schoolterm=#{2}

select pkid, schoolid, name, schoolterm, weekdays, courselen, morningsessions, afternoonsessions, eveningsessions, workstartdate, workenddate, learnstartdate, learnenddate, createtime from basic_schoolyearterm WHERE schoolid=#{0} and curdate() between workstartdate and workenddate LIMIT 1
